title: chore(node-api): bootstrap Express service with health + placeholder endpoints
author: josephp1005
pr_body:
- New services/node-api directory
- package.json with Express, Morgan, and Nodemon setup
- src/index.js with three basic routes:
- GET /health → service healthcheck
- GET /wallet/:address → logs and returns a placeholder balance
- POST /tx/simulate → logs body and returns a dummy simulation response
- Dev script with Nodemon for hot reload
